paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm of David.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm of David.

paragraphs.content: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.

paragraphs.content: O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.

paragraphs.content: But know that the LORD hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the LORD will hear when I call unto him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But know that the Lord hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the Lord will hear when I call unto him.

paragraphs.content: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the Lord.

paragraphs.content: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? Lord, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.

paragraphs.content: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.
